        public void viewAllMenuItem(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> menuItems)

      • updateMenuItem

        public java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> updateMenuItem(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> menuItems)
        Update a MenuItem from parameter, ArrayList menuItems,
        user choose a Menu Item from menuItems,
        user enter new values for chosen Menu Item
        Parameters:
        menuItems - available ArrayList menuItems
        Returns:
        updated ArrayList menuItems, where one of the MenuItem is updated
        null if user exit

      • deleteMenuItem

        public java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> deleteMenuItem(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> menuItems)
        Delete a MenuItem from parameter, ArrayList menuItems,
        user choose a Menu Item from menuItems that will be deleted
        Parameters:
        menuItems - available ArrayList menuItems
        Returns:
        updated ArrayList menuItems, where one of the MenuItem is deleted
        null, if menuItems size == 0 or menuItems == null or if user exit
